turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how may i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to place a order at the Starbucks in Key Largo, Florida on US 1.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: aw, i'm sorry. it looks like that's a seasonal drink and is not currently being offered. did you want another drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll take a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Small with non Oh, hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. and did you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Nonfat, nondairy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the non dairy options are coconut, almond and soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: SYW SWY.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you said you want a tall hot caramel macchiato with soy milk from Starbucks in Florida on US 1.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total is $4.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Absolutely.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful. the drink will be ready in 10 minutes. do you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want you to have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure will. why thank you.
